Reference

All functions

add_addl_future_moons()

Add more more moons to accomplish requested forecast length

add_ensemble()

Add ensemble model to forecasts

add_future_moons()

Add future moons to the moon table

all_options() dir_options() PortalData_options() data_options() moons_options() rodents_options() covariates_options() metadata_options() predictions_options() models_options() cast_options()

Prepare options lists for a portalcasting directory

append_cov_fcast_csv()

Append a covariate forecast to existing covariate forecasts

append_csv()

Save data out to a csv, appending the file if it already exists

append_observed_to_cast()

Append the observed values to a table of -casts

append_past_moons_to_raw()

Append missing past moons to the raw data

AutoArima()

Flexible Auto-Regressive Integrated Moving Average model for Portal Predictions

base_path() main_path() sub_paths()

Determine the path for a specific level of a portalcasting directory

cast_models()

Source the scripts to run the selected forecast or hindcast models

casts() cast() step_casts()

Run one or potentially multiple forecasts or hindcasts

check_args() check_arg()

Check a function's arguments' values for validity

check_to_skip()

Check if the newmoon should be skipped during a set of hindcasts

classy()

Set the class(es) of an object

cleanup_dir()

Remove the temporary files in PortalData and tmp

clear_tmp()

Clear tmp subdirectory

combine_forecasts()

Combine forecasts and append them to existing files

compile_aic_weights()

Calculate model weights

covariate_models()

Create a covariate model list

create_dir() create_main_dir() create_sub_dirs() create_sub_dir()

Create the structure of a portalcasting directory

create_tmp()

Create tmp subdirectory

dataout()

Save data out to a file and return it

dirtree()

Define the names of the directory tree for a forecasting directory

download_predictions()

Download the predictions files from the Portal Predictions repo

enforce_rodents_options()

Enforce the specific options for a given rodent data type

ESSS()

Exponential Smoothing State Space model for Portal Predictions

fcast0()

Zero-abundance forecast

file_paths()

Determine the path for a file or files in the forecasting directory

fill_dir() fill_PortalData() fill_data() fill_predictions() fill_models()

Populate the components of a portalcasting directory

forecast_covariates() forecast_ndvi() forecast_weather()

Forecast covariates for forecasting or hindcasting

format_moons()

Format the moon data

foy()

Calculate the fraction of the year from a date

get_climate_forecasts()

Download downscaled weather forecasts for Portal

interpolate_abundance()

Interpolate missing rodent data

is.spcol()

Which columns are species columns

lag_covariates()

Lag covariate data

make_ensemble()

Create the ensemble model from all other forecasts

measure_cast_error()

Summarize a table of -casts to -cast-level errors

messageq()

Optionally generate a message based on a logical input

model_names()

Provide the names of models

model_options() AutoArima_options() ESSS_options() nbGARCH_options() pevGARCH_options() nbsGARCH_options()

Prepare options for a portalcasting model

model_paths()

Determine the path for one or more models in the model sub directory

model_scripts()

Provide the names of model scripts in the models subdirectory

models_to_cast()

Generate the file path(s) to the script(s) of the model(s) forecast or hindcast with

most_recent_cast()

Determine the most recent forecast or hindcast

most_recent_census()

Determine the most recent data collection

na_conformer()

Conform NA entries to "NA" entries

nbGARCH()

negative binomial Generalized AutoRegressive Conditional Heteroscedasticity model for Portal Predictions

nbsGARCH()

negative binomial seasonal Generalized AutoRegressive Conditional Heteroscedasticity model for Portal Predictions

pevGARCH()

poisson environmental variable Generalized Auto-Regressive Conditional Heteroscedasticity model for Portal Predictions

plot_cast_point()

Plot forecast or hindcast predictions for a given point in time across multiple species.

plot_cast_point_yaxis()

Expand the names with formating for a multi-species -cast plot y axis

plot_cast_ts()

Visualize a forecast or hindcast

plot_cast_ts_xaxis()

Add a -cast plot x-axis

plot_cast_ts_ylab()

Expand the name with formating for a -cast plot y label

plot_cov_RMSE_mod_spp()

Plot RMSE and coverage as a function of model for each species

plot_err_lead_spp_mods()

Plot error as a function of lead time for each of a combination of species and model

portalcast()

Forecast or hindcast Portal rodents models

portalcasting

Functions for Portal Forecasting

prep_covariates()

Prepare covariate data table

prep_data()

Prepare data subdirectory for a forecast or hindcast run(s)

prep_fcast_covariates()

Prepare forecast covariate data table

prep_hist_covariates()

Prepare historical covariates data

prep_metadata()

Prepare model metadata

prep_moons()

Prepare temporal (lunar) data

prep_rodents()

Collect and process historic rodent data for -casting

prep_rodents_list()

Prepare historic rodent data

prep_weather_data()

Prepare historical weather data

read_cast() read_casts()

Read in a cast file or multiple cast files and set the class

read_data() read_all() read_controls() read_covariates() read_covariate_forecasts() read_moons() read_metadata()

Read in a data file and format it for specific class

remove_incompletes()

Remove any specific incomplete entries as noted by an NA

remove_spp()

Remove species from the rodent data table

rodent_spp()

Rodent species abbreviations

save_forecast_output()

Save forecast output to files

select_casts()

Select the specific fore- or hindcast from a casts table

select_most_ab_spp()

Select the most abundant species from a forecast or hindcast

setup_dir()

Set up a full forecasting directory

step_hind_forward()

Step the hind_step values forward

subdirs()

Define the names of the subdirectories in a forecasting directory

today()

Today's date (potentially with time)

transfer_hist_covariate_forecasts()

Transfer the historical covariate data forecasts to the data folder

transfer_trapping_table()

Transfer the trapping table to the data folder

trim_moons_fcast()

Trim the moons table for covariate forecasting

trim_treatment()

Remove the treatment column from the rodent data table

update_covariates()

Update the covariate data for a step in a hindcast

update_covfcast_options()

Update the data options for covariate forecasts based on existing data

update_data()

Update the data for each subsequent step in a hindcast

update_rodents_list()

Update the rodent data for a step in a hindcast

verify_PortalData()

Verify that the PortalData subdirectory is present and has required data

verify_cast() cast_is_valid()

Verify that a read-in cast file is formatted appropriately

verify_models()

Verify that models requested to forecast or hindcast with exist

write_model() model_template()

Write the template for a model into model subdirectory
